creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: elaborate, bonnet-style headdress; black cotton base; body of bonnet decorated with large silver metal studs; large silver metal balls on sides at front; Indian rupee silver coins at sides and on front dangles termination in large silver metal half-circle pallets; a third similar pallet hangs from white beaded front center loop with long beaded fringe; long beaded fringes on each side; beaded loops on top; trapezoidal metal plate with hammered geometric designs on back; large separate D-shaped hammered metal element fits on back; second smaller separate D-shaped metal element with beaded strands and red fur strands terminating in white and red horsehair tassels
dimension: 29 x 7 13/16 x 10 3/16 in. (73.66 x 19.84 x 25.88 cm) (including beaded tassels)
medium: Metal, beads, coins, cotton, animal fur (?), horsehair, wood
title: Headdress
